description: Alterations including rear roof extension (main), installation of four roof lights to front roof slope, and three roof lights to side roof slope; single-storey side/ rear extensions at Ground Floor level; formation of shallow roof pitch, and installation of four roof lights to Ground Floor side extension; excavation to create basement and associated stair well, and formation of front and rear light wells.
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.  REASON:	In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title number(s): Planning, Design & Access Statement; 1- D5 Site Location Plan; 1- D6 Existing Floor Plan; 2- D6 Existing First Floor Plan; 3- D6 Existing Second Floor Plan; 3- D6 Existing Roof Plan; 4- D6 Existing Front Elevation;  5- D6 Existing Left Elevation; 6- D6 Existing Right Elevation; 7- D6 Existing Rear Elevation; 8- D6 Proposed Basement Floor; 9- D6 Proposed Ground Floor Plan; 10- D6 Proposed First Floor Plan; 11- D6 Proposed Loft Floor Plan; 12- D6 Proposed  Roof Plan; 13- D6 Proposed Front Elevation; 14- D6 Proposed Left Elevation; 15- D6 Proposed Right Elevation; 16- D6 Proposed Rear Elevation; 17- D6 Proposed Section AA; 18- D6 Proposed Section BB; unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local Planning Authority.  Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building and those stated wihtin the herby approved plans and elevations.  Reason:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies 7A, Local Variation 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1(g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (consolidated 2015). | No part of the roof of the rear extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.  Reason:  To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties, in accordance with the Council's adopted Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies 7A, Local Variation 7.4 and 7B, policies 1.1(g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the adopted Local Development Framework (Core Strategy 2012) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (consolidated 2015).
